name: 2 min jam
description:
The game jam is almost over and you haven't even started yet!

You have two minutes to code a game.  You'll need two things assets, and code.

To code, put your cat onto the keyboard or jump on it. (the keyboard, not the cat)

Your wifi is going to download you assets, you'll have to grab them and put them in your PC. Be careful not to put a virus in your computer. The wifi is soehat unstable, so you may need to unplg and re-plug the router to get it to work again.

Additionally, you may get hungry, so you'll need some snacks. You'll have to protect them from rats using your cat.

Fianlly, your lamp may turn off, in which case you'll have to turn it on again, unless you want to work in the dark.

Also i was to lazy to add sound.

Made for the Low Effort Jam 9
